description: Enterprise techniques used by APT18, ATT&CK group G0026 v2.1
name: APT18 (G0026)

techniques.comment: APT18 uses HTTP for C2 communications.[3]
APT18 uses DNS for C2 communications.[3]
APT18 establishes persistence via the HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run key.[4][3]
APT18 uses cmd.exe to execute commands on the victim’s machine.[3][4]
APT18 actors leverage legitimate credentials to log into external remote services.[2]
APT18 can list files information for specific directories.[3]
APT18 actors deleted tools and batch files from victim systems.[1]
APT18 can upload a file to the victim’s machine.[3]
APT18 obfuscates strings in the payload.[3]
APT18 actors used the native at Windows task scheduler tool to use scheduled tasks for execution on a victim network.[1]
APT18 can collect system information from the victim’s machine.[3]
APT18 actors leverage legitimate credentials to log into external remote services.[2]
